attributes.action: United kingdom to bring back national service.
attributes.additional_details:
The British government had national service from 1947-1960 for all able-bodied men between the ages of 18 and 30.
A 3 year period of service minimum with the choice to stay in and extend your career should you chose to.
attributes.background:
National service could reduce the amount of crime.
Reduce the amount of people out of work.
It will strengthen the armed forces.
Bring the next generation discipline, focus and time to achieve a great career path after there time served.
Save our tax payer money by have less people on benefits.
